Name: La Vendangeuse
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist (discarded) & grapes on stick.
MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker.
Review: Depending on the ripeness of your grapes, and the sweetness of your palate, you may want to stretch to half a shot sugar syrup. Strike the right balance and you’ll be rewarded with a medley of white grapes, white wine and botanical gin freshness with faint, cleansing zesty citrus.
